section_a.beneficiaries: al The company’s activities will provide benefit to ... Members of the fitness facility and any visitors; we will have an open door policy so anyone from the local area of Abergavenny (& beyond) will be welcome. They will be welcome to train during the “open gym” times and/or take part in any of the classes. Classes will run 3 times per day during the week and on a Saturday morning. We also have plans to run classes for children on a Sunday but this is yet to be decided
